I'm going to give it a shot in the near future (before Feb 11) * just the b=
rute-force approach of rewriting ARCs in the NEDLIB form.  In the immediate=
 term I'm a little hampered by the rather severe memory requirements of the=
 NWA exporter (it croaks, out of memory, on what I'd call medium-sized inpu=
t sets) but I should have my environment ironed out soon.
 
Andy Boyko    a=
boy@...


>>> gojomo@... 1/27/2004 6:42:39 PM >>>

Has anyone b=
egun work on tools to make an ARC-based dataset available
through the NWA A=
ccess Toolset (http://nwa.nb.no/) -- either by coercing
the ARC data into a=
 Nedlib format or making a ARC-aware retriever/exporter?

Please keep us at=
 the IA apprised of any progress, or any way we could
help with code or tes=
ting.

- Gordon @ Internet Archive
